src:
欧冠-维纳尔杜姆破僵张伯伦建功 利物浦2-1根克

07 Nov 2019, 03:00

【网易体育6日讯】2019-2020赛季欧冠小组赛E组第四轮展开角逐，卫冕冠军利物浦坐镇安菲尔德球场迎战比利时球会根克。上半场比赛，维纳尔杜姆在第13分钟率先破门，根克在第40分钟将比分扳平。下半场比赛，张伯伦在第52分钟将比分反超。最终全场比赛结束，利物浦在主场以2-1的比分战胜了根克。两家球会在欧战史上交锋一次，即本赛季欧冠小组赛第一回合，红军客场4-1大胜。欧战史上，利物浦曾14次战比利时球会，取得了11胜2平1负，唯一一败是1978年欧洲超级杯第一回合客场1-3负于安德莱赫特，此后6战比利时球会取得5胜1平不败成绩。在安菲尔德球场，利物浦6战比利时球会取得了全胜战绩，打进15球，仅丢4球。根克曾在欧战史上4战英格兰球队，仅取得1胜3平成绩。双方出场名单：利物浦（4-3-3）：1-阿利松；66-阿诺德、4-范戴克、12-乔-戈麦斯、7-米尔纳；3-法比尼奥、5-维纳尔杜姆、8-纳比-凯塔（73’26-罗伯逊）；11-萨拉赫、15-张伯伦（73’10-马内）、27-奥里吉（89’9-菲尔米诺）。根克（3-5-2）：28-库克；2-德诺雷、33-卢库米、46-奎斯塔；6-德韦斯特、、17-赫罗绍夫斯基（84’27-邦贡）、25-博格、8-海嫩、31-梅勒；7-伊东纯也（67’77-恩东加拉）、10-萨马塔（84’18-奥努阿楚）。
text:
Champions League - Wiener Dum breaks the sorrow of Chamberlain Liverpool 2-1 G

07 Nov 2019, 03:00

[Netease Sports 6th News] 2019-2020 season Champions League group E group fourth round of competition, defending champion Liverpool sitting at the Anfield Stadium against the Belgian club Genk. In the first half, Wiener Dum scored the first goal in the 13th minute, and Genk equalized the score in the 40th minute. In the second half, Chamberlain took the lead in the 52nd minute. At the end of the game, Liverpool beat Genk at home with a score of 2-1. The two clubs will compete once in the history of the European War, that is, the first round of the Champions League group match this season, the Red Army 4-1 victory. In the history of the European War, Liverpool had 14 matches in the Belgian club and scored 11 wins, 2 draws and 1 loss. The only defeat was in the 1978 European Super Cup first leg away from 1-3 and lost to Anderlecht. The Belgian club scored 5 wins and 1 draw unbeaten. At Anfield, Liverpool's 6-game Belgian club scored a total victory, scoring 15 goals and losing only 4 goals. Genk once scored 1 win and 3 draws in the 4th England team in the history of the European War. List of appearances: Liverpool (4-3-3): 1-Alysson; 66-Arnold, 4-Van Dyke, 12-Joe-Gomez, 7-Milna; 3-Fabinho, 5- Wiener Dum, 8-Nabi-Keta (73'26-Robertson); 11-Sarah, 15- Chamberlain (73'10-Mene), 27-Origid (89'9-Phil Minor). Genk (3-5-2): 28-Cook; 2-Denore, 33-Lukumi, 46-Questa; 6-De West, 17-Hrosovsky (84' 27-Bangon), 25-Borg, 8-Hainen, 31-Meller; 7-Idong Chunya (67'77-Endongara), 10-Samata (84'18- Onu Achu).
